CUSTOMER 360 GUIDE FOR RETAIL
Customer-Centric Journeys

Drive engagement and purchases by sending your shoppers on relevant, personalized journeys.

Shoppers want premium experiences and content that is relevant for them. Personalized experiences yield a 4.5 times higher per-visit spend. However, 64 percent of shoppers agree that retailers don’t truly know them.

Personalization allows you to enhance your marketing by making messages smarter and more focused. Use Salesforce to know your customers better, implement personalized messaging, and engage with shoppers at scale.

Recommended Products

These products can help you deliver customer-centric journeys to your customers.

Marketing Cloud
B2C Commerce
Service Cloud
Solutions

Get quick time to value by selecting Salesforce recommended solutions that you can implement immediately, while putting together a roadmap to build out more mature capabilities over time. To help you find solutions that your business is ready for right now, resources are divided into three levels depending on complexity.

Business Capabilities

Your organization’s implementation of a capability can range from undeveloped to industry-leading. For each capability, we list best practices that you can use to grow your maturity and provide information on solution implementation.

Marketing Capabilities for Customer Centric Journeys
Keep your customers at the heart of your marketing with customer-centric journeys and messaging.
Commerce Capabilities for Customer Centric Journeys
Create a personalized marketing experience for your customers using browse control, site and cart recommendations, merchandising, behavioral email strategy, and campaign planning and strategy.
